source:
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

# Create Spark session with the required package
spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("ExcelToCSV") \
    .config("spark.jars.packages", "com.crealytics:spark-excel_2.12:3.3.2") \
    .getOrCreate()

# Path to Excel file in ADLS
excel_path = "abfss://library@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/library2015.xls"

# Read Excel file using Spark-Excel
df = spark.read.format("com.crealytics.spark.excel") \
    .option("header", "true") \
    .option("inferSchema", "true") \
    .option("dataAddress", "'All'!A1") \
    .load(excel_path)

# Drop the unwanted column
df = df.drop("Kokoelmat: Videotallenteet (2018-)")

# Show DataFrame schema and preview data
df.printSchema()
df.show(5)

# Save as CSV in ADLS
csv_output_path = "abfss://library@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/library2015.csv"
df.write.mode("overwrite").option("header", "true").csv(csv_output_path)
